summary: In London, a mother and daughter navigate their respective romances: Madeline rekindles an affair from thirty years earlier, while her daughter Vera is caught between a musician who cannot commit and her ex, who still pines for her.
cast: Chiara Mastroianni|Catherine Deneuve|Ludivine Sagnier|Louis Garrel|Milos Forman|Paul Schneider|Michel Delpech|Radivoje Bukvic|Omar Ben Sellem|Dustin Segura-Suarez|Guillaume Denaiffe|Clara Couste|Francine Beaur|Anaïs Chetoui|Amélie Flottat|Julia Marty|Jean-Charles Clichet|Bonnie Duvauchelle|Côme Rérat|Fabrice Uhel|Kate Moran|Zuzana Krónerová|Václav Neuzil|Pavel Liska|Zuzana Onufráková|Robert Liska|Frantisek Krizek|Vaclav Nic|Stéphane Milochevitch|Sébastien Froment|Peter Helmer|Goldy Notay|Kenneth Collard|Cédric Andrieux|Benoit Causse|Ashley Chen|Francesca Mattavelli|Jaime Roque De La Cruz|Gavin Brocker|Aicha Kossoko|Eric Tschaeppeler|Evgeniya Kosova|Fabien Hagege|Belle Williams
title: Les bien-aimés
